articles.content: SAN DIEGO COUNTY, Calif. Researchers at UC San Diego have been testing our wastewater and they are seeing a COVID virus spike. This wastewater testing is a leading indicator meaning the virus will sh… [+2310 chars]

articles.title: Omicron is 'an astronomically contagious disease,' medical expert says - ABC News
articles.description: ABC News’ Linsey Davis speaks with Dr. Alok Patel of Stanford Children’s Health on the rapid spread of omicron as it becomes the most dominant variant in the...
